articles.title: Ferrari accused of ‘living in denial’ as it clarifies its F1 future - Fox Sports
articles.description: McLaren have fired back at Ferrari, accusing it of “living in denial” over their criticism of plans to lower Formula 1’s budget cap.
articles.content:
Ferrari opposed reports of lowering the budget cap, claiming it would have a significant impact on F1s value in the motorsports landscape.
It cannot be attained without further significant sacrifices, especially in terms of our human resources, Ferrari princ… [+1980 chars]

articles.title: Ben Cousins to fight stalking, drugs charges - 9News
articles.description: Fallen AFL champion Ben Cousins will spend at least one more night in prison pending a bail application and has indicated he'll fight nearly all new charges against him, including aggravated stalking in Perth.
